languages.text: "Если кому ума хватит сунуться на Даргонус, то быстро пожалеет. Ты батареи наши хотя бы раз видал? А полки стражей, которые на нижних уровнях держат?"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] В смысле? У нас тут дворец, куча охраны и солдат. К чему вообще такие вопросы?

languages.text: "If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of wardens that are kept on the lower levels?"
languages.original_text: "Если кому ума хватит сунуться на Даргонус, то быстро пожалеет. Ты батареи наши хотя бы раз видал? А полки стражей, которые на нижних уровнях держат?"

traits.locale_text: "If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of enforcers that are kept on the lower levels?"
"If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of enforcers that are kept on the lower levels?"
"If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of wardens that are kept on the lower levels?"

languages.text: “如果有人真的蠢到打算在达戈努斯碰碰运气，他们很快就会后悔。你见过我们的炮台吗？见过我们驻守在底层的守卫吗？”
languages.original_text: "If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of wardens that are kept on the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: “如果有人真的蠢到打算在达戈努斯碰碰运气，他们很快就会后悔。你见过我们的炮台吗？见过我们驻守在底层的守卫吗？”

languages.text: «Si alguien es lo bastante insensato como atacar Dargonus, pronto lo lamentará. ¿Tú has visto las baterías? ¿Y los regimientos desplegados en los niveles inferiores?».
languages.original_text: "If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of wardens that are kept on the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: «Si alguien es lo bastante insensato como atacar Dargonus, pronto lo lamentará. ¿Tú has visto las baterías? ¿Y los regimientos desplegados en los niveles inferiores?».

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスで運試しするほどバカな奴がいたら、あっという間に後悔するよ。あの砲台を見ろよ？それに、下層で待機しているワーデンの連隊もいるんだぜ？」
languages.original_text: "If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of wardens that are kept on the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスで運試しするほどバカな奴がいたら、あっという間に後悔するよ。あの砲台を見ろよ？それに、下層で待機しているワーデンの連隊もいるんだぜ？」

languages.text: "Falls jemand dumm genug ist, sein Glück auf Dargonus zu versuchen, wird er es bald bereuen. Habt Ihr schon mal unsere Geschützbatterien gesehen? Oder die Wächterregimenter auf den unteren Ebenen?"
languages.original_text: "If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of wardens that are kept on the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: "Falls jemand dumm genug ist, sein Glück auf Dargonus zu versuchen, wird er es bald bereuen. Habt Ihr schon mal unsere Geschützbatterien gesehen? Oder die Wächterregimenter auf den unteren Ebenen?"

languages.text: « Si des crétins viennent s'en prendre à Dargonus, ils vont vite le regretter. Tu as vu nos batteries de canons ? Ou les régiments de gardes postés dans les niveaux inférieurs ? »
languages.original_text: "If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of wardens that are kept on the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: « Si des crétins viennent s'en prendre à Dargonus, ils vont vite le regretter. Tu as vu nos batteries de canons ? Ou les régiments de gardes postés dans les niveaux inférieurs ? »

languages.text: "Dargonus'ta şansını deneyecek kadar salak biri çıkarsa çok kısa sürede pişman olur. Bataryalarımızı veya alt seviyelerde tutulan muhafız birliklerimizi gördün mü?"
languages.original_text: "If someone is dumb enough to try their luck on Dargonus, they'll quickly regret it. Have you ever seen our batteries? Or the regiments of wardens that are kept on the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus'ta şansını deneyecek kadar salak biri çıkarsa çok kısa sürede pişman olur. Bataryalarımızı veya alt seviyelerde tutulan muhafız birliklerimizi gördün mü?"
